dropdownBar.sql: select C.CName from Class P, Class C, Inheritance I where P.CName = @cName and I.PCID = P.CID and I.CCID = C.CID
dropdownBar.Des: navBar 的選項或是縣市下面有哪些鄉鎮市區

getTownshipRes.sql: select O.resName, O.addr, O.meal, O.cuisine, O.stayTime from Class C, CO , object O where C.CName = @cName and CO.CID = C.CID and CO.OID = O.OID
getTownshipRes.Des: 符合鄉鎮市區的餐廳(ex:埔里鎮)

getTownRes.sql: select P.NamePath, O.resName, O.addr, O.meal, O.cuisine, O.stayTime from class P, class C, CO, object O, Inheritance I where P.CName = @cName and P.CID = I.PCID and I.CCID = C.CID and C.CID = CO.CID and CO.OID = O.OID;
getTownRes.Des: 符合縣市的餐廳(ex:南投縣)
